Package gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils

Class ParserUtils

java.lang.Object
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils.ParserUtils
public class ParserUtils extends Object
ParserUtils is a utility class supporting Parsing of V2 messages into FHIR
Author:
Audacious Inquiry

    • toPattern

      public static Pattern toPattern(String... values)
      Convert a list of values into a Pattern that matches it (case insensitively) This method is used to create Matchers to match sets of known values (e.g., states, countries, street name abbreviations, et cetera).
      Parameters:
      values - The values to convert
      Returns:
      A compiled pattern that matches the specified string

    • isEmpty

      public static boolean isEmpty(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Type type)
      Detect (without exceptions) if HAPI V2 type is empty
      Parameters:
      type - The type to check
      Returns:
      true if the component is empty or throws an exception, false if it has data.

    • cleanupIsoDateTime

      public static String cleanupIsoDateTime(String value, boolean hasDate)
      Convert an ISO-8601 string to one with punctuation
      Parameters:
      value - The string to cleanup
      hasDate - True if this string has a date, false if just the time
      Returns:
      The cleaned up ISO-8601 string suitable for use in FHIR

    • hasLegalIso8601Chars

      public static boolean hasLegalIso8601Chars(String value, boolean hasDate)
      Check to see if a string contains only legal counts of ISO-8601 characters
      Parameters:
      value - The string to check
      hasDate - True if this string has a date, false if just the time
      Returns:
      True if the string looks like an ISO-8601 string, false otherwise.

    • unescapeV2Chars

      public static String unescapeV2Chars(String value)
      Given a string containing escaped HL7 Version 2 characters, translate them to the standard values.
      Parameters:
      value - The string to translated
      Returns:
      The translated string

    • escapeV2Chars

      public static String escapeV2Chars(String value)
      Given a string possibly containing V2 reserved characters, translate the reserved characters to their standard escape sequences.
      Parameters:
      value - The string to escape
      Returns:
      The escaped string

    • iterateStructures

      public static void iterateStructures(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Group g, Set<ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Structure> structures)
      Iterate over a set of structures and add them to a set This is primarily used by testing components to get a set of segments for testing from test messages, by may also be useful in StructureParser objects to enumerate the message components in a message or group. NOTE: Use a LinkedHashSet to get the structures in order.
      Parameters:
      g - The group to traverse
      structures - The set of structures to add to.

    • iterateSegments

      public static void iterateSegments(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Group g, Set<ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment> structures)
      Iterate over a set of structures and the segments within them to a set This is primarily used by testing components to get a set of segments for testing from test messages, by may also be useful in StructureParser objects to enumerate the message components in a message or group. NOTE: Use a LinkedHashSet to get the segments in order.
      Parameters:
      g - The group to traverse
      structures - The set of structures to add to.
      See Also:
      • iterateStructures(Group, Set)

    • getComponent

      public static ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Type getComponent(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Type type, int number)
      Get a component from a composite
      Parameters:
      type - The composite to get the component from
      number - The zero-indexed component to get
      Returns:
      The component, or null if type doesn't represent a Composite

    • getField

      public static ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Type getField(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment segment, int field)
      Get the first occurrence of a field in a segment, nor null if it does not exist or an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      segment - The segment to get the field from
      field - The zero-index field number
      Returns:
      The first occurence of the field

    • getFields

      Parameters:
      segment - The segment to get the field from
      field - The zero-index field number
      Returns:
      The fields

    • hasField

      public static boolean hasField(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment segment, int field)
      Test if a segment has a value in a given field
      Parameters:
      segment - The segment to test
      field - The field to look for
      Returns:
      true if the field is present, false otherwise

    • getFieldType

      public static ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Type getFieldType(String segment, int number)
      Get the type of a field in a segment Used in path conversions to determine the type of a component
      Parameters:
      segment - The segment to check
      number - The field within the segment
      Returns:
      The first occurrence of the field

    • getSegment

      public static ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment getSegment(String segment)
      Create a segment of the specified type
      Parameters:
      segment - The type of segment to create
      Returns:
      The constructed segment, or null if the segment type is unknown.

    • toReference

      public static org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Reference toReference(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource resource, org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource source, String... searchNames)
      Create or get the existing reference for a resource. Every resource has a singular reference returned by this method. This ensures the reference is consistent across all uses based on the values in the resource such as identifier, and name. Set the reference id to the resource id, and make this reference point to the resource through getResource().
      Parameters:
      resource - The resource to create the reference to
      source - The resource which points to the newly created reference
      searchNames - The name used to reference this from the source
      Returns:
      The created Reference
      See Also:
      • getResource(Class, Reference)

    • mergeReferences

      public static void mergeReferences(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource first, org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource later)
      Make the references to a later resource point to the first resource instead. Enables merging of two resources into one.
      Parameters:
      first - The first resource
      later - The later resource

    • updateReference

      public static void updateReference(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource resource, org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Reference ref)
      Make references nicer by adding an identifier and display properties, but don't overwrite any existing ones. Essentially, the first referencing improving property is set, but no further ones will be added.
      Parameters:
      resource - The resource the reference points to
      ref - The reference to update.

    • getResource

      public static <T extends org.hl7.fhir.instance.model.api.IBaseResource> T getResource(Class<T> clazz, org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Reference ref)
      Get the resource linked to this reference. This method can be used on the reference returned by toReference.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The class of the resource
      Parameters:
      clazz - The class
      ref - The reference
      Returns:
      The resource linked to the reference.
      See Also:
      • toReference(DomainResource, Resource, String...)

    • getFirstChild

      public static org.hl7.fhir.instance.model.api.IBase getFirstChild(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource r, String name)
      Get the first child of the specified name
      Parameters:
      r - The resource
      name - The name of the property
      Returns:
      The value of the property

    • needsIsoCleanup

      public static Boolean needsIsoCleanup(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Type t)
      Return true if this datatypes string representation is of a date type and therefore needs to be restated to ISO with punctuation.
      Parameters:
      t - The data type
      Returns:
      true if cleanup is needed.

    • getFollowingSegment

      public static ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment getFollowingSegment(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment segment, String findName)
      Given a segment, find the segment following it with the given name. Stops at the end of the group the segment is in, or once it finds a repetition of the same original segment.
      Parameters:
      segment - The segment to start the search from.
      findName - The segment type to find
      Returns:
      The found segment, or null of it could not be found.
